content: Upload logos with a transparent background (PNG, SVG, JPG) for light and dark themes, or generate one instantly by entering your Your logo below.

comment.text: Upload a logo with a transparent background to use as a subtitle in light and dark themes.

usage.context:
<div className="wl-helper">
 <Text
 className="wl-subtitle wl-helper-label settings_unavailable"
 fontSize="13px"
 >
 {t("WhiteLabelSubtitle")}
 <HelpButton
 tooltipContent={
 <Text fontSize="12px">{t("WhiteLabelTooltip")}</Text>
 }
 place="right"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation doesn't accurately reflect the original English content. The English text refers to uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate one. The Arabic translation only mentions entering the company name and uploading a logo without specifying background requirements or the generation option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل اسم شركتك وقم بتحميل شعار بخلفية شفافة (PNG، SVG، JPG) للسمات الفاتحة والداكنة، أو قم بإنشاء شعار تلقائيًا بإدخال شعارك أدناه.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation is missing the information about supported file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG) for the logo upload.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل اسم شركتك وقم بتحميل الشعار (PNG، SVG، JPG) بخلفية شفافة…

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation omits the mention of 'light and dark themes' as specified in the English text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل اسم شركتك وقم بتحميل الشعار بخلفية شفافة للسمات الفاتحة والداكنة…

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. The English text mentions uploading logos and generating them. The Azerbaijani translation only mentions entering a company name and stylizing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirkətinizin loqonuzu yükəyin (Şəffaf fonlu PNG, SVG, JPG formatında) işıq və qaranlıq temalar üçün, və ya aşağıdakı xanaya loqonuzu daxil etməklə dərhal yaradın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation omits the information about supported image formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirkətinizin loqonuzu yükəyin (Şəffaf fonlu PNG, SVG, JPG formatında) işıq və qaranlıq temalar üçün, və ya aşağıdakı xanaya loqonuzu daxil etməklə dərhal yaradın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation omits the mention of light and dark themes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirkətinizin loqonuzu yükəyin (Şəffaf fonlu PNG, SVG, JPG formatında) işıq və qaranlıq temalar üçün, və ya aşağıdakı xanaya loqonuzu daxil etməklə dərhal yaradın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation significantly deviates from the original English meaning. The English text explicitly mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate a logo. The Bulgarian translation focuses solely on entering the company name and customizing the style, omitting the crucial aspect of logo upload/generation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предоставете възможност за качване на логото с прозрачен фон (PNG, SVG, JPG) за светла и тъмна тема, или генерирайте логото на момента, като въведете вашето лого по-долу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation lacks the specific file format instructions (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предоставете възможност за качване на логото с прозрачен фон (PNG, SVG, JPG) за светла и тъмна тема, или генерирайте логото на момента, като въведете вашето лого по-долу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The mention of 'light and dark themes' is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предоставете възможност за качване на логото с прозрачен фон (PNG, SVG, JPG) за светла и тъмна тема, или генерирайте логото на момента, като въведете вашето лого по-долу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation doesn't accurately reflect the original English content. The English text explicitly mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate a logo. The Czech translation only mentions entering a company name and customizing the style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte název společnosti, nahrajte logo s průhledným pozadím (PNG, SVG, JPG) pro světlý a tmavý režim, nebo si ho vygenerujte okamžitě zadáním vašeho loga níže.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The details about supported file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) are missing from the Czech translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte název společnosti, nahrajte logo s průhledným pozadím (PNG, SVG, JPG) pro světlý a tmavý režim, nebo si ho vygenerujte okamžitě zadáním vašeho loga níže.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The reference to light and dark themes is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte název společnosti, nahrajte logo s průhledným pozadím (PNG, SVG, JPG) pro světlý a tmavý režim, nebo si ho vygenerujte okamžitě zadáním vašeho loga níže.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation doesn't accurately reflect the original English content. The English text specifically mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate one. The German translation only mentions entering a company name and adjusting the design.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Geben Sie Ihren Firmennamen ein, laden Sie Logos mit transparentem Hintergrund (PNG, SVG, JPG) für helle und dunkle Themes hoch, oder generieren Sie ein Logo sofort, indem Sie Ihren Firmennamen unten eingeben.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation is missing the mention of supported file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) for the logo upload.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Geben Sie Ihren Firmennamen ein, laden Sie Logos mit transparentem Hintergrund (PNG, SVG, JPG) für helle und dunkle Themes hoch, oder generieren Sie ein Logo sofort, indem Sie Ihren Firmennamen unten eingeben.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'passen Sie das Design an Ihr Branding an' is a more general statement and doesn't directly translate the option to generate a logo.  It implies customization, but not specifically logo generation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: oder generieren Sie ein Logo sofort, indem Sie Ihren Firmennamen unten eingeben.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation deviates significantly from the original English meaning. It focuses on 'entering your company name' and 'customizing the style' which aren't explicitly mentioned in the English content. The original text refers to uploading logos and optionally generating them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ανεβάστε λογότυπα με διαφανές φόντο (PNG, SVG, JPG) για τα θέματα φωτός και σκοτεινού, ή δημιουργήστε ένα αμέσως εισάγοντας το λογότυπό σας παρακάτω.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original text specifies allowed file types (PNG, SVG, JPG). This information is missing in the Greek translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ανεβάστε λογότυπα με διαφανές φόντο (PNG, SVG, JPG) για τα θέματα φωτός και σκοτεινού, ή δημιουργήστε ένα αμέσως εισάγοντας το λογότυπό σας παρακάτω.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original text refers to light and dark themes. This is missing from the Greek translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ανεβάστε λογότυπα με διαφανές φόντο (PNG, SVG, JPG) για τα θέματα φωτός και σκοτεινού, ή δημιουργήστε ένα αμέσως εισάγοντας το λογότυπό σας παρακάτω.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation does not accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. The English text refers to uploading logos and generating them, while the Spanish translation focuses on entering a company name and customizing style. It misses the crucial element of logo uploading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cargue logotipos con fondo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro y oscuro, o genere uno al instante ingresando su logotipo a continuación.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation omits the accepted file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) mentioned in the English text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cargue logotipos con fondo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro y oscuro, o genere uno al instante ingresando su logotipo a continuación.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo below' is not adequately translated.  'Su logotipo a continuación' is a more accurate representation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduzca el nombre de su empresa, cargue el logotipo y personalice el estilo para que coincida con su marca, o genere uno al instante ingresando su logotipo a continuación.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation "Syötä yrityksesi nimi, lataa logo ja muokkaa tyyli brändäykseksi sopivaksi" does not accurately convey the meaning of the English content "Upload logos with a transparent background (PNG, SVG, JPG) for light and dark themes, or generate one instantly by entering your Your logo below." It combines multiple instructions (enter company name, upload logo, customize style) and misses the detail about transparent backgrounds and light/dark themes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lataa läpinäkyvä logo (PNG, SVG, JPG) vaaleaa ja tummaa teemaa varten, tai luo logo nopeasti syöttämällä yrityksesi nimi alle.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The accepted file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) are missing from the Finnish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add the accepted file types to the suggestion above: "Lataa läpinäkyvä logo (PNG, SVG, JPG) vaaleaa ja tummaa teemaa varten, tai luo logo nopeasti syöttämällä yrityksesi nimi alle."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo' is not reflected in the translation. It implies a personalized aspect of logo generation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: To address the 'Your logo' aspect, consider including a phrase like 'oma logo' (your logo) within the translated sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation significantly alters the meaning of the English content. The English text explicitly mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and offers the option of instant generation. The French translation only mentions entering the company name and customizing style, omitting the logo upload and generation options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saisissez le nom de votre entreprise, téléchargez un logo avec un fond transparent (PNG, SVG, JPG) pour les thèmes clair et foncé, ou générez-le instantanément en entrant votre logo ci-dessous.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The requirement for transparent background (PNG, SVG, JPG) is missing from the French translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: See suggestion above for complete incorporation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo below' is not accurately represented in the French translation. It's implied, but not explicitly stated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saisissez le nom de votre entreprise, téléchargez un logo avec un fond transparent (PNG, SVG, JPG) pour les thèmes clair et foncé, ou générez-le instantanément en entrant votre logo ci-dessous.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation doesn't accurately reflect the original English content. The English text mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and generating logos. The Armenian translation focuses solely on entering the company name and customizing the style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք ձեր ընկերության անունը, վերբեռնեք լոգոն՝ թափանցիկ ֆոնով (PNG, SVG, JPG) լույսի և մութ թեմաների համար, կամ ստեղծեք այն միանգամյա՝ մուտքագրելով ձեր լոգոն ստորև։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation is missing the specific file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG) mentioned in the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք ձեր ընկերության անունը, վերբեռնեք լոգոն՝ թափանցիկ ֆոնով (PNG, SVG, JPG) լույսի և մութ թեմաների համար, կամ ստեղծեք այն միանգամյա՝ մուտքագրելով ձեր լոգոն ստորև։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation does not mention light and dark themes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք ձեր ընկերության անունը, վերբեռնեք լոգոն՝ թափանցիկ ֆոնով (PNG, SVG, JPG) լույսի և մութ թեմաների համար, կամ ստեղծեք այն միանգամյա՝ մուտքագրելով ձեր լոգոն ստորև։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation "Inserisci il nome della tua azienda, carica il logo e personalizza lo stile in modo che corrisponda al tuo marchio." doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. The English text explicitly mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate one. The Italian translation focuses on company name insertion and brand customization but omits the logo uploading and generation aspects.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carica loghi con sfondo trasparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) per i temi chiaro e scuro, oppure generane uno istantaneamente inserendo il tuo logo qui sotto.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation is missing the explicit mention of supported file types (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carica loghi con sfondo trasparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) per i temi chiaro e scuro, oppure generane uno istantaneamente inserendo il tuo logo qui sotto.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation doesn't mention 'light and dark themes' as specified in the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carica loghi con sfondo trasparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) per i temi chiaro e scuro, oppure generane uno istantaneamente inserendo il tuo logo qui sotto.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation "会社名を入力し、ロゴをアップロードし、ブランディングに合わせたスタイリングにカスタマイズをしましょう" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of the English content. It focuses on inputting a company name and customizing styling, while the original text emphasizes uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and offering a generation option.  The phrase 'Upload logos...' is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 会社ロゴをアップロードするか、透明背景(PNG, SVG, JPG)で作成するか、会社名を入力して自動生成することも可能です。ライトテーマとダークテーマに対応させてください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The requirement for transparent backgrounds (PNG, SVG, JPG) is not mentioned in the Japanese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 透明背景(PNG, SVG, JPG)で作成するか

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions light and dark themes. This information is not reflected in the translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ライトテーマとダークテーマに対応したロゴをアップロードするか、

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation doesn't accurately reflect the English content. The English text refers to uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and generating them, while the Korean translation broadly mentions entering a company name and branding customization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 회사 이름을 입력하고 투명 배경의 로고를 업로드하거나, 아래 로고 정보를 입력하여 즉시 생성하세요. (PNG, SVG, JPG 포맷 지원)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation omits the information about supported file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 회사 이름을 입력하고 투명 배경의 로고를 업로드하거나, 아래 로고 정보를 입력하여 즉시 생성하세요. (PNG, SVG, JPG 포맷 지원)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks the distinction between light and dark themes for the logos.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 회사 이름을 입력하고 밝은 테마와 어두운 테마에 맞는 투명 배경의 로고를 업로드하거나, 아래 로고 정보를 입력하여 즉시 생성하세요. (PNG, SVG, JPG 포맷 지원)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ໃສ່ຊື່ບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານ, ອັບໂຫຼດໂລໂກ້, ແລະປັບແຕ່ງຄໍເຕົ້າໄຂ່ທີ່ໃຫ້ກົງກັບຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງທ່ານ." does not accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. It primarily focuses on company name and brand alignment, whereas the original text describes uploading logos and offering a logo generation option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that mentions uploading logos with transparency options and the possibility of generating a logo. A possible suggestion is: "ອັບໂຫຼດໂລໂກ້ທີ່ມີພື້ນຖານໂຄງ່າງການເປັນໂປ່ງໃສ່ (PNG, SVG, JPG) ສຳລັບຮູບແບບແສງສີສົດ ແລະມືດ ຫຼື ສ້າງມັນໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດໂດຍການໃສ່ໂລໂກ້ຂອງທ່ານໃຕ້ນີ້".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original text specifies acceptable file types (PNG, SVG, JPG). This information is missing from the Lao translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Include the file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) in the Lao translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຄໍເຕົ້າໄຂ່ທີ່ໃຫ້ກົງກັບຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງທ່ານ' (align the egg carton with your brand) is a very awkward and inaccurate translation of 'themes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation for 'themes', such as 'ຮູບແບບ' or 'ແບບໂຈະ້'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation 'Ievadiet sava uzņēmuma nosaukumu, augšupielādējiet logotipu un pielāgojiet stilu atbilstoši savam zīmolam.' does not accurately reflect the English content. It primarily focuses on entering a company name and adjusting the style, while the English text discusses uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate them. The reference to 'Your logo' is also lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ievadiet sava uzņēmuma logotipu ar caurspīdīgu fonu (PNG, SVG, JPG) gan gaišajam, gan tumšajam tēmam, vai ģenerējiet to momentāni ievadot savu logotipu zemāk.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation is missing the information about acceptable file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG) mentioned in the English text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add '(PNG, SVG, JPG)' after 'ievadiet sava uzņēmuma logotipu' if using the suggested correction above.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The instruction about uploading logos for both light and dark themes is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add 'gan gaišajam, gan tumšajam tēmam' after 'ievadiet sava uzņēmuma logotipu' if using the suggested correction above.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation 'Voer uw bedrijfsnaam in, upload het logo en pas de styling aan aan uw huisstijl' does not accurately reflect the English content. It combines the logo upload instruction with a styling adjustment which isn't mentioned in the English original. It also introduces 'bedrijfsnaam' (company name) which isn't in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like: 'Upload logo's met een transparante achtergrond (PNG, SVG, JPG) voor lichte en donkere thema's, of genereer er direct één door uw logo hieronder in te voeren.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation is missing the file format information (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Include ' (PNG, SVG, JPG)' after 'Upload logo's met een transparante achtergrond'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions 'light and dark themes', which is absent in the Dutch translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add information about light and dark themes. Example: '... voor lichte en donkere thema's.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation 'Wpisz nazwę swojej firmy, wgraj logo i dostosuj stylizację, aby lepiej pasowała do Twojego brandingu' does not accurately reflect the English content. The English text specifically mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate a logo. The Polish translation primarily focuses on entering the company name and adjusting styling, omitting the details about transparent backgrounds and logo generation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like: "Wgraj logo o przezroczystym tle (PNG, SVG, JPG) dla jasnych i ciemnych motywów, lub wygeneruj je natychmiast, wpisując nazwę swojego logo poniżej." or "Wgraj logo w formacie PNG, SVG lub JPG z przezroczystym tłem dla jasnych i ciemnych motywów, lub wygeneruj je automatycznie, podając nazwę swojego logo poniżej."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation does not mention the accepted file types (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add the supported file types to the Polish translation. For example: 'Wgraj logo w formacie PNG, SVG lub JPG...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation misses the mention of 'light and dark themes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a reference to 'light and dark themes' to the Polish translation for accurate context. Something like '...dla jasnych i ciemnych motywów.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. The English text specifically mentions uploading logos and options for light/dark themes, and the ability to generate a logo. These elements are missing in the Portuguese translation. It also introduces the concept of 'personalize the style', which isn't present in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduza o nome da sua empresa, carregue logótipos com fundo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro e escuro, ou gere um instantaneamente ao inserir o seu logótipo abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text specifies acceptable file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG) for the logos. This information is absent in the Portuguese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding "(PNG, SVG, JPG)" after 'carregue logótipos' to include the acceptable file formats.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English mentions options for light and dark themes, which is missing from the Portuguese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase like 'para temas claro e escuro' or a similar phrase to indicate the availability of light and dark theme logo options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation "Insira o nome da sua empresa, carregue o logotipo e personalize o estilo para combinar com a sua marca." doesn't accurately reflect the English content. The English text refers to uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate one. The Portuguese translation focuses on company name, logo upload and styling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue logotipos com fundo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro e escuro, ou gere um instantaneamente inserindo o seu logotipo abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation omits the mention of supported image formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue logotipos com fundo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro e escuro, ou gere um instantaneamente inserindo o seu logotipo abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation lacks the reference to 'light and dark themes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue logotipos com fundo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro e escuro, ou gere um instantaneamente inserindo o seu logotipo abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo' has been awkwardly translated. The possessive pronoun 'Your' is missing in the Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue logotipos com fundo transparente (PNG, SVG, JPG) para temas claro e escuro, ou gere um instantaneamente inserindo o seu logotipo abaixo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Introduceţi numele companiei dvs, încărcați sigla şi particularizați stilul pentru a se potrivi cu brandingul dvs." does not accurately reflect the English content "Upload logos with a transparent background (PNG, SVG, JPG) for light and dark themes, or generate one instantly by entering your Your logo below." It primarily focuses on company name and styling, missing the crucial aspect of logo uploading and transparent background specifications. The phrase 'Your logo below' is also not translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Încărcați sigle cu fundal transparent (PNG, SVG, JPG) pentru temele deschise şi întunecate sau generați una instantaneu introducând sigla dvs. mai jos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation does not mention the accepted file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Încărcați sigle cu fundal transparent (PNG, SVG, JPG) pentru temele deschise şi întunecate sau generați una instantaneu introducând sigla dvs. mai jos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation does not mention the existence of light and dark themes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Încărcați sigle cu fundal transparent (PNG, SVG, JPG) pentru temele deschise şi întunecate sau generați una instantaneu introducând sigla dvs. mai jos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation significantly alters the meaning of the original English content. The English text explicitly mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and offers an option to generate one. The Russian translation only mentions entering a company name and setting the style according to branding, omitting the logo upload and generation aspects.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Введите название вашей компании, загрузите логотип с прозрачным фоном (PNG, SVG, JPG) для светлой и темной тем, или сгенерируйте его мгновенно, введя ваш логотип ниже.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The mention of supported file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) is missing from the Russian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Введите название вашей компании, загрузите логотип с прозрачным фоном (PNG, SVG, JPG) для светлой и темной тем, или сгенерируйте его мгновенно, введя ваш логотип ниже.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo below' is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation.  The English indicates providing the logo to generate one.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Введите ваш логотип ниже, чтобы сгенерировать его.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation doesn't accurately reflect the English content. The English text refers to uploading logos and generating them. The Sinhala translation focuses on providing a company name and customizing a pattern, which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: උප බ්‍රාන්‍ඩ් ලාංඡනයක් (PNG, SVG, JPG) සුදුමැලි පසුබිම සහිතව සුදු හා කළු ජේදනය සඳහා උඩුගත කරන්න, නැතහොත් ඔබේ ලාංඡනය ක්ලික් කරමින් ඔබේ ලාංඡනය ක්ලික් කරමින් ක්ලික් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation is missing the information about acceptable file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: උප බ්‍රාන්‍ඩ් ලාංඡනයක් (PNG, SVG, JPG) සුදුමැලි පසුබිම සහිතව සුදු හා කළු ජේදනය සඳහා උඩුගත කරන්න, නැතහොත් ඔබේ ලාංඡනය ක්ලික් කරමින් ඔබේ ලාංඡනය ක්ලික් කරමින් ක්ලික් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo below' is not accurately translated. It's more accurately conveyed as 'your logo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ ලාංඡනය ක්ලික් කරමින් ක්ලික් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation "Zadajte názov svojej spoločnosti, nahrajte logo a prispôsobte štýl tak, aby zodpovedal vašej značke." does not accurately reflect the English content. It combines multiple actions (entering company name, uploading logo, customizing style) while the English text specifically mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate one.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nahrajte logá s transparentným pozadím (PNG, SVG, JPG) pre svetlé a tmavé témy, alebo si jedno vygenerujte okamžite tým, že uvediete vaše logo nižšie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The requirement for transparent backgrounds (PNG, SVG, JPG) is missing from the Slovak translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add the detail about the supported file types and transparent background requirement.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation does not mention the option to generate a logo instantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase like "alebo si ho vygenerujte jednoducho..." to reflect the instant generation option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation significantly alters the meaning of the original English content. The English text is about uploading logos or generating one. The Slovenian text focuses on entering the company name and customizing the style to match the brand. The functionality of uploading or generating a logo is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Naložite logotip s prozornim ozadjem (PNG, SVG, JPG) za svetlo in temno temo, ali pa ga ustvarite takoj z vnosom vašega logotipa spodaj.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation omits the specific file types mentioned in the English text (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Naložite logotip s prozornim ozadjem (PNG, SVG, JPG) za svetlo in temno temo...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Your logo below' is not adequately translated. 'Your' is implied in Slovenian, making the translation awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vnesite logotip spodaj.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation does not accurately reflect the English content. The English text refers to uploading logos and generating them, while the Serbian translation only mentions entering a company name and adjusting the style to match the brand. It misses the uploading and generation aspects.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Унесите назив своје компаније, отпремите логотип са прозрачном позадином (PNG, SVG, JPG) за светле и тамне теме, или га генеришите тренутно уносом вашег логотипа испод.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation is missing the details about acceptable file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) and the mention of light and dark themes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add the file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) and mention of light and dark themes, as found in the English version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Unesite naziv svoje kompanije, otpremite logotip i prilagodite stil da odgovara vašem brendu.' does not accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. It combines logo uploading with company name input and branding styling, whereas the English refers to uploading logos with transparent backgrounds or generating them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otpremite logotip sa providnom pozadinom (PNG, SVG, JPG) za svetle i tamne teme, ili ga generišite odmah upisivanjem vašeg logotipa ispod.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation lacks the specific file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) mentioned in the English text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add 'PNG, SVG, JPG' after 'logotip' to specify accepted file formats.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation does not mention 'light and dark themes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a mention of 'svetle i tamne teme' to match the English content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'your logo below' is not conveyed in the Serbian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dodajte rečenicu 'ili ga generišite odmah upisivanjem vašeg logotipa ispod.' (or generate it immediately by entering your logo below)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Şirketinizin adını girin, logoyu yükleyin ve stili markanıza uyacak şekilde özelleştirin.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of the English content. It mentions entering the company name, while the English text asks for logo upload and logo generation options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirket logonuzu yükleyin (şeffaf arka planlı PNG, SVG, JPG) açık ve koyu temalar için veya logonuzu hemen oluşturmak için aşağıda şirket adınızı girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation omits the information about supported file formats (PNG, SVG, JPG).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirket logonuzu yükleyin (şeffaf arka planlı PNG, SVG, JPG) açık ve koyu temalar için veya logonuzu hemen oluşturmak için aşağıda şirket adınızı girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'stili markanıza uyacak şekilde özelleştirin' is vague. The English text implies options for theme customization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Açık ve koyu temalar için yükleyin veya hemen oluşturmak için şirket adınızı girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation "Введіть назву вашої компанії, передайте логотип і налаштуйте стиль відповідно до свого бренду" does not accurately reflect the English content. It mentions company name and brand styling, which are not present in the English text. The English text focuses on uploading logos and providing an option to generate one.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Передайте логотип з прозорим фоном (PNG, SVG, JPG) для світлої та темної теми, або згенеруйте його миттєво, ввівши свій логотип нижче.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation is missing the file format specifications (PNG, SVG, JPG) from the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Додайте вказівку на формати файлів (PNG, SVG, JPG) у перекладі.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation "Nhập tên công ty của bạn, tải logo lên và tùy chỉnh phong cách để phù hợp với thương hiệu của bạn" does not accurately reflect the English content. The English text specifically mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate a logo. The Vietnamese version focuses on entering company name, uploading a logo, and customizing style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tải lên logo với nền trong suốt (PNG, SVG, JPG) cho chủ đề sáng và tối, hoặc tạo ngay lập tức bằng cách nhập logo của bạn bên dưới.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation is missing the information about accepted file types (PNG, SVG, JPG) for the logo.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Include the file types mentioned in the English text: 'PNG, SVG, JPG'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The option to generate a logo 'instantly by entering your logo below' is missing from the Vietnamese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase that explains the option to generate a logo by entering it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "输入公司名称、上传徽标并自定义其风格以匹配您的品牌风格" does not accurately reflect the original English content. The original text mentions uploading logos with transparent backgrounds and the option to generate a logo instantly. The translation focuses solely on entering the company name and customizing styles, omitting key functionality described in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that captures the functionality of uploading logos with transparent backgrounds (PNG, SVG, JPG) for light and dark themes, and the option to generate a logo instantly by entering a logo below. A possible suggestion: “输入公司名称和徽标，上传带有透明背景的徽标文件（PNG、SVG、JPG）以适应亮色和暗色主题，或者输入您的徽标以快速生成。”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English text specifies accepted file types (PNG, SVG, JPG). This information is missing from the Chinese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Include the accepted file types in the Chinese translation. For example, add: (PNG、SVG、JPG).
